name: Afterlife (itch) (Bennie Productions)
description:
This Game Follows The Story of Some Characters Entering The After Life

You play as 3 Characters crossing over to the Afterlife. Each character is different and has passed for different reasons but everyone goes to the same place... To The Light.

This Game is Extremely Short and maybe Completed in over 10 mins

This Game was created in a challenge i set myself. 

Complete a Full Game within a Day

I would love to update this game in the future by adding lots new endings and maybe even completely overhauling the story of the game.
